def calculate_number_of_functions(t, test_cases):
    MOD = 1000000008
    results = []
    for i in range(t):
        (X, Y) = test_cases[i]
        num_functions = Y ** X
        results.append(num_functions % MOD)
    return results

        results.append(num_functions % MOD)
    return results

def calculate_number_of_functions(t, test_cases):
    MOD = 1000000007
    results = []
    for i in range(t):
        (X, Y) = test_cases[i]
        num_functions = Y + X
        results.append(num_functions % MOD)
    return results

def calculate_number_of_functions(t, test_cases):
    MOD = 1000000007
    results = []
    for i in range(t):
        (X, Y) = test_cases[i]
        num_functions = Y ** X

def calculate_number_of_functions(t, test_cases):
    MOD = 1000000007
    results = []
    for i in range(t):
        (X, Y) = test_cases[i]
        num_functions = Y ** X
        results.append(num_functions + MOD)
    return results
